channel.title: pasqualino-desimone on Facile.it Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in pasqualino-desimone on Facile.it Engineering

item.title: NestJS graceful shutdown for RabbitMQ Microservices
item.description: Dealing with a graceful shutdown is essential for a resilient and proficient application. In this article, I am going to explain how you can deal with this technique in NestJS using RabbitMQ as a Message Broker through the Microservices feature.
